overview:
Olivier Grinda â€“ Serial Entrepreneur.

As an internet entrepreneur, Olivier has successfully transposed and adapted European and American business models to Latin America.

In June of 2011, Olivier co-founded Shoes4you.com.br, the first fashion brand in Brazil to sell exclusive collections through monthly online subscriptions.

In March of 2010, Olivier co-founded clickon.com.br, with the ambition to dominate the group buying market in Brazil. Olivier joined to team of management in January 2011 to oversee the expansion of clickon throughout Latin America.

Prior to clickon, Olivier co-founder brandsclub.com.br in January of 2009, in the hopes to be a category killer in the private sales club space in Latin America. As Chief Marketing officer and Co-founder, Olivier drove the customer acquisition, customer relationship management, product development and branding efforts.

Olivier graduated from the University of Miami, with a B.A. in economics with a double minor in political science and psychology in 2008.

milestones.description: Co-founded shoes4you and holds the position of C.E.O.
milestones.source_description: Redpoint And Accel Back Brazilâ€™s Online Subscription E-Commerce Site Shoes4You
